title: Happy Thanksgiving GD!
body:
http://www.chicagonow.com/reflections-chicago-life/files/2016/11/post-what-are-you-thankful-for-thanksgiving-contest1.jpg

To all my fellow Americans (and a belated to my Canadian friends), Happy Thanksgiving!  Hope you all have a wonderful day filled with food, family, and thankfulness.  What are you thankful for today?

I'm thankful for my new family as I spend time with my in-laws today.  I'm thankful for all the amazing experiences I've had this past year.  And, of course, I'm thankful for my GD family that has grown this year.  You guys are the best ;)

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nZwnfeUZKU4/WDdlZUDJh3I/AAAAAAAABi0/YcB9mq7rZbEg8TH2U8wp38a52eIw31YlACLcB/s1600/Happy-Thanksgiving-Images.jpg
